title: what is this font
content:
Hi,

I am looking for a while and I can not find what this typography. If someone has an idea ... it gladly! :-)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fonte.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823111552/http:/typophile.com/files/fonte_4.jpg) | 138.7 KB |
author: tita

comments.content: Part of /g, looks like [Castle](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823111552/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/castle). Weird regular / [g](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823111552/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/castle/t-book/glyphs.html#glyphs/469823/72) actually so may be it has been decided to redraw it.
hi, thank you very much for this information, it helps me a lot!
